price: Such is Allah, your Lord, the Creator of everything; none has the right to be worshiped except Him. How are you then deluded?
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
